verses.verse: <S%G3778>This<s%> is the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5154>time<s%> I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you. <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G4487>fact<s%> is to be <S%G2476>confirmed<s%> by the <S%G4750>testimony<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>

I have <S%G4275>previously<s%> <S%G4275>said<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G3918>present<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1208>time,<s%> and though <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G548>absent<s%> I <S%G4302>say<s%> in <S%G4302>advance<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who have <S%G4258>sinned<s%> in the <S%G4258>past<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> as well, that <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> I will not <S%G5339>spare<s%> [anyone,]

<S%G1893>since<s%> you are <S%G2212>seeking<s%> for <S%G1382>proof<s%> of the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> who <S%G2980>speaks<s%> in me, and <S%G3739>who<s%> is not <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> you, but <S%G1414>mighty<s%> in you.

For <S%G2532>indeed<s%> He was <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of <S%G769>weakness,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> He <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> For we <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> in Him, <S%G235>yet<s%> we shall <S%G2198>live<s%> with Him <S%G1537>because<s%> of the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> [directed] <S%G1519>toward<s%> you.

<S%G3985>Test<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> [to see] <S%G1487>if<s%> you are in the <S%G4102>faith;<s%> <S%G1381>examine<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves!<s%> <S%G2228>Or<s%> do you not <S%G1921>recognize<s%> this about <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is in you â€“ <S%G1487>unless<s%> <S%G3385><s%> indeed you <S%G96>fail<s%> the <S%G96>test<s%>?
But I <S%G1679>trust<s%> that you will <S%G1097>realize<s%> that we <S%G1473>ourselves<s%> <S%G1510>do<s%> not <S%G96>fail<s%> the <S%G96>test.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G2172>pray<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> that you <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2556>wrong;<s%> not that we <S%G1473>ourselves<s%> may <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G1384>approved,<s%> but that you may <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>what<s%> is <S%G2570>right,<s%> <S%G1161>even<s%> <S%G5613>though<s%> we should <S%G1510>appear<s%> <S%G5613><s%> <S%G96>unapproved.<s%>
For we <S%G1410>can<s%> do <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> but [only] for the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

For we <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> we <S%G1473>ourselves<s%> are <S%G770>weak<s%> but you are <S%G1415>strong;<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2172>pray<s%> for, that you be <S%G2676>made<s%> <S%G2676>complete.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> I am <S%G1125>writing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> while <S%G548>absent,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that when <S%G3918>present<s%> I may not <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G664>severity,<s%> in <S%G2596>accordance<s%> with the <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> me, for <S%G3619>building<s%> up and not for <S%G2506>tearing<s%> <S%G2506>down.<s%>

<S%G3062>Finally,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> be <S%G2675>made<s%> <S%G2675>complete,<s%> be <S%G3870>comforted,<s%> be like-minded, <S%G1514>live<s%> in <S%G1514>peace;<s%> and the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall be with you.

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
